Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

“We can rebuild him… or her… or it. Enhancements are unnecessary. Our fallen heroes learn by the very nature of their termination. They say that spending so much time waiting in the Void is the greatest of all teachers.”[br/]– Rachel Greene, Nurse
This is a victory condition where the player attempts to win by unifiying the planet under their own control.
A Dwelling is an NPC controlled structure, it is effectively a City that belongs to an NPC faction.
NPC Factions are independent groups of aliens/robots/etc who the player can meet and interactive, but not directly control themselves.

Commanders are other players, an alliance is the highest level of diplomatic relationship

An ally has launched the Planetary Unifier Protocol
Planetary Unifier Protocol is a special operation that the player uses to start the countdown to win the unifier victory

Reputation is the score that determnins how the player is seen by other players. It is a measure of how trustworthy and peaceful they are.
Planetary Unifier Protocol is a special operation that the player uses to start the countdown to win the unifier victory
Awaken the Planet-CORE node and petition for the status of Planetary Unifier. This will start a timer that can end the game.
Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet.
Declare support for your ally by triggering the protocol yourself with Planet-CORE. This will reduce your allies probationary period by {reductionDuration}, allowing you all to win the game faster.
Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet. Probtionary Period is the name of the countdown the player must wait for befroe they win the victory condition
Planet-CORE has decided to consider your request. Based on your current situation, victory will be granted in:
Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet.
Only added a space, no re-localization required.
Planet-CORE has received your petition. Your ally is now considered a better candidate for planetary ruler. Their victory will now be granted in:

Your ally has initiated a CORE node to attempt to unite the planet under their leadership.[br/][br/]The CORE node will assess their suitability for this role over the following period: {turnTimer}[br/][br/]After this period, they will gain control of the planet and end the game. Since you are their ally, you will be named their co-ruler.
CORE node is aother name for Planet-CORE. Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet.

Another commander has initiated a CORE node to attempt to unite the planet under their leadership.[br/][br/]The CORE node will assess their suitability for this role over the following period: {turnTimer}[br/][br/]After this period, the player and their allies will be named as rulers of the planet, and the game will end.
CORE node is aother name for Planet-CORE. Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet.
Planet-CORE has completed their analysis of your performance and rejected your application to be named ruler of this planet. The reason given is:
Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet.
A commander has failed to convince Planet-CORE of their suitability to become planetary ruler. Their application countdown has been terminated.
Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet. A commander is another player.
A commander has withdrawn their application to Planet-CORE to be named planetary ruler. Their application countdown has been terminated.
Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet. A commander is another player.

CORE is now in its final stage of analysis for your suitability as planetary leader. This is a delicate time, the slightest mistake could send our plans into disarray. If all goes as planned, we will be named Planetary Ruler in {turnTimer}.[br/][br/]During this period, external events will no longer reduce the countdown.
CORE node is aother name for Planet-CORE. Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet.

Your ally has now entered the final phase of consideration by CORE as planetary ruler. This is a delicate time; the slightest mistake could send our plans into disarray. If all goes as planned, we will be named Planetary Rulers in {turnTimer}.[br/][br/]During this period, external events will no longer reduce the countdown.
CORE node is aother name for Planet-CORE. Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet.

One of our enemies stands on the brink of being name planetary ruler by CORE. If we are to stop them, we must capture their dwellings and turn the natives of the planet against them. Of course, if we were to ally with them, then we would be able to share the planet ourselves…[br/][br/]The enemy will win the game in {turnTimer}.
CORE node is aother name for Planet-CORE. Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet.
Due to a number of recent events, Planet-CORE has adjusted the duration of your assessment period. The new duration is {turnTimer}:
Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet.
Your alliance no longer controls {numColoniesNeeded} friendly colonies
Alliance refers the player and the other players they are allies with
Your reputation has fallen too low
Reputation is the score that determnins how the player is seen by other players. It is a measure of how trustworthy and peaceful they are.
Dawn of a New Union is the name of a tech group that the player must research in order to use the victory condition

Reputation is the score that determnins how the player is seen by other players. It is a measure of how trustworthy and peaceful they are. Virtuous is the name given to the highest level of reputation
A Dwelling is an NPC controlled structure, it is effectively a City that belongs to an NPC faction.

Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet.
Final Consideration is the name for the last few turns of the countdown befroe the player wins the game using the Unifier victory condition.
Final Consideration! You will win in {INT_Turns}[turn/]
Final Consideration is the name for the last few turns of the countdown befroe the player wins the game using the Unifier victory condition.
By building an Alliance with the NPC factions on this planet and other players, you will be able to convince Planet-CORE to grant you rulership of the planet.

Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet. NPC Factions are independent groups of aliens/robots/etc who the player can meet and interactive, but not directly control themselves.

Planet-CORE is assessing your application. You will need to defend your dwellings and maintain your alliances. Wars with players and NPC factions will delay the process, while making new alliances and gathering new dwellings will accelerate it.[br/][br/]You must remain in control of {INT_numDwellings} friendly dwellings and keep your reputation above {STR_requiredLevel} or the process will be terminated!

Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet. NPC Factions are independent groups of aliens/robots/etc who the player can meet and interactive, but not directly control themselves. A Dwelling is an NPC controlled structure, it is effectively a City that belongs to an NPC faction.

Planet-CORE is in the Final Phases of your application. In this period, nothing can accelerate the process, though the process can still be delayed by wars and lost dwellings.[br/][br/]You must remain in control of {INT_numDwellings} friendly dwellings and keep your reputation above {STR_requiredLevel} or the process will be terminated!
Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet. A Dwelling is an NPC controlled structure, it is effectively a City that belongs to an NPC faction.

Planet-CORE is assessing your ally's application. You can aid them by accepting new friendly dwellings into your empire, or launching the Planetary Unification Protocol yourself.[br/][br/]Your alliance must remain in control of {INT_numDwellings} friendly dwellings or the process will be terminated!

Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet. A Dwelling is an NPC controlled structure, it is effectively a City that belongs to an NPC faction. Planetary Unifier Protocol is a special operation that the player uses to start the countdown to win the unifier victory

Planet-CORE is in the Final Consideration phase of your ally's application. In this period, nothing can accelerate the process, though the process can still be delayed by wars and lost dwellings. [br/][br/]Your ally must remain in control of {INT_numDwellings} friendly dwellings or the process will be terminated!

Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet. A Dwelling is an NPC controlled structure, it is effectively a City that belongs to an NPC faction. Final Consideration is the name for the last few turns of the countdown befroe the player wins the game using the Unifier victory condition.

Your enemy has petitioned Planet-CORE to become ruler of this planet. This process can be slowed by engaging them in wars, undermining their alliances and conquering their dwellings.[br/][br/]Your enemy's alliance will be victorious in {INT_Turns}[turn/][br/][br/]To cancel the impending victory of your enemy's alliance you need to capture {INT_numDwellings} of their friendly dwellings, or drop their reputation to {STR_requiredLevel}.
Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet. A Dwelling is an NPC controlled structure, it is effectively a City that belongs to an NPC faction.

Your enemy is now in the Final Consideration phase of their application to become named planetary ruler. This process can be slowed by engaging them in wars, undermining their alliances and conquering their dwellings.[br/][br/]To cancel their attempt you need to capture {INT_numDwellings} of their friendly dwellings, or drop their reputation to {STR_requiredLevel}.

Planet-CORE is a ficitonal AI that he player is asking to name them ruler of the planet. A Dwelling is an NPC controlled structure, it is effectively a City that belongs to an NPC faction. Final Consideration is the name for the last few turns of the countdown befroe the player wins the game using the Unifier victory condition.
A Dwelling is an NPC controlled structure, it is effectively a City that belongs to an NPC faction.
Reputation is the score that determnins how the player is seen by other players. It is a measure of how trustworthy and peaceful they are.

Instead of using force to conquer this planet, we will use our influence and alliances to come out on top.[br/][br/]Relation gains for completing quests is increased by {RelationIModifier} and you get a {ReputationModifier} increase to your reputation.

Reputation is the score that determnins how the player is seen by other players. It is a measure of how trustworthy and peaceful they are. Relation is the score that determines how strong a player's relation ship is with an NPC faction
